4.entity_description: Bird species collectively, a group of animals that play multiple ecological roles in ecosystems worldwide, including seed dispersal, natural pest control, pollination, nutrient cycling, and environmental monitoring.

4.resolution_context: All three mentions describe the same bird-mediated reduction of pest populations as a beneficial ecological role, differing only in phrasing and granularity, so they should be represented as a single ecosystem service entity.
